Player History
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Detroit in 1971...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1972, off Tom Seaver (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1972, off Phil Niekro (CHW)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1972...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Minnesota on 6/2/1973...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 8/11/1973...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1973...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 9/14/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1976, hitting .391 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1976, hitting .295 with 7 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1976, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1976, hitting .361 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1977, hitting .480 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1978, hitting .383 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1981, hitting .357 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1981, hitting .327 with 9 HR, 22 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 6/1/1981...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1981, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1981, hitting .284 with 33 HR, 109 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 4 runs on 7/1/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1982, hitting .404 with 8 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1982, hitting .538 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 6/28/1983 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
